653000.name: Facility - Donation DLC
653000.description:
Donations DLC:

This DLC contains no data, and will only unlock an addition Achievement after completing the mission. This mission is available for free to everyone who bought the base game. Buy this DLC only if you want to support the further development of Beyond Enemy Lines. You won't get any special content for buying this DLC.

A brand new mission with around 1h new playtime.


Intel located a high security bunker complex in the mountains. Your task is to infiltrate the facility which is supplying the bunker complex with power. Infiltrate it and shut down the facility, destroy as much equipment as possible and collect all data you can find.

Your Objectives are:
  • Place C4 on the tanks
  • Shut down the facility
  • Download data
  • Exfiltrate
653000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
